text: “Nia daane huogodoo o godou henua, gi lloomoi e daumaha gi Dimaadua hagadolu i di ngadau e dahi, i di gowaa hai daumaha dela ga hilihili go Dimaadua: i di Laangi Pasoobaa, i Taumaha o di Hagadogodo o nia Huwa laagau, mo Tagamiami o nia Damaa hale Hagaabili. Taane e dahi e gaamai dana wanga dehuia
